page.title: 02THE COMMUNITY PROJECT CONT
page.content: Station. The group prepared their questions carefully beforehand and recorded the answers on tape or in their reporters notebooks. All visits were reported to the class in an aural form and after discussion a written report was compiled. Information was collected through observation and questioning Members of the community came into school or were interviewed at their workplace or home. Their cooperation was remarkable. All data was entered in a data file. Finally it was not until the following term that the pages for the Domesday Project were written. It proved an easy task after so much first hand learning.
